attributes.action: Stop bank employees receiving bonuses in the light of tax payers bailing them out:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am shocked that Alistair Darling intimated that bankers may still receive bonuses for hard work.  Many of us work hard and receive NO bonuses and I think it is disgraceful that this practise should still be allowed in the light of the present financial crisis of this country and that we, the taxpayers have had to bail them out.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
